title: Volkswagen GTI Racing 1.0 (Eng.2006.RIP)
description:
Volkswagen GTI Racing 1.0 (Eng/2006/RIP) 
Release: 2006 | PC | Windows | English | Developer: Prominence | 280MB 
Genre: Racing | Cars 

GTI Racing uniquely blends a realistic and highly detailed car physics simulation with the pure fun of driving. Enjoy the greatest collection of the legendary European Volkswagen Golf series cars, representing all five generations from its original heritage through to the current day. Try out the GTI, G60 and the outstanding R32! Check out Volkswagens concept cars plus the classics.
